sources.title: The Shadow of Chikara (1977)
sources.description: Two former Confederate captains try to remove diamonds hidden in the Arkansas mountains, but a native spirit guards the sacred site against intruders. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-shadow-of-chikara-1977/

metadata.Plot: Confederate veterans of the last battle of the Civil War set out to find a hidden treasure: diamonds hidden in a cave. However, the soldiers find they are being followed by a mysterious hunter (or hunters) who may have a connection to a mythic eagle spirit.
metadata.Actors: Joe Don Baker, Sondra Locke, Ted Neeley
